channel.title: Don't shoot the puppy!
channel.description:
[url=http://www.addictinggames.com/dontshootthepuppy.html]Don't do it.[/url]
You basically try to get the dog to walk to the other side. You do this by not clicking/moving the mouse. [b]At all[/b] Some tips - Click start, and take your hand off the mouse (to make sure you don't click)
Level 3 - An ad will pop up (if it's your first time playing the game, it may surprise you) don't click it ~Level 8 (dont remember exactly) - There will be a nail and your mouse turns into a hammer, STILL DONT MOVE THE MOUSE! Level 10 - The screen will go black, THE GAME IS NOT OVER! Level 12 - It will appear that you didn't "start the game", but in fact you did! Don't click again!
PS - It's a stupid game, only play if you are extremely bored, your mouse doesnt work, or you enjoy shooting puppies.

item.title: Don't shoot the puppy!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Don’t do it.

You basically try to get the dog to walk to the other side. You do this by not clicking/moving the mouse. At all
Some tips -
Click start, and take your hand off the mouse (to make sure you don’t click)

Level 3 - An ad will pop up (if it’s your first time playing the game, it may surprise you) don’t click it
~Level 8 (dont remember exactly) - There will be a nail and your mouse turns into a hammer, STILL DONT MOVE THE MOUSE!
Level 10 - The screen will go black, THE GAME IS NOT OVER!
Level 12 - It will appear that you didn’t “start the game”, but in fact you did! Don’t click again!

PS - It’s a stupid game, only play if you are extremely bored, your mouse doesnt work, or you enjoy shooting puppies.
